other_tests.findings: Diffuse strongly reduced, although not absent, 99mTc-pertechnetate uptake by the thyroid gland after 30 min, suggesting a diagnosis of iodide transport defect (ITD).
High sweat-test values indicated cystic fibrosis with chloride concentration of 87 and 91 mEq/liter.

other_tests.procedure_name: Molecular analysis of the CFTR gene
other_tests.findings: Identified the previously described mutation /H9004F508 as responsible for cystic fibrosis.
